thread.title: Clamping down on Comments

author: news24.com
title: Clamping down on Comments
text: I cannot believe what I am heraring or seeing. I do not believe that stopping a comment on an article or story is the answer. You will always get an idiot that passes an unacceptable comment and by so doing messes it up for everybody else; especially if this person has too much bravemaker inside him. I have however seen that by clamping down on comments actually exacerbates the situation instead of correcting it. I therefore want to ask News24 to refrain from blocking comments as I firmly believe in freedom of expression and the inviolate right of freedom of the press.Thank you,Johan de LANGE
